description: Conditions of Carriage set out your rights and duties as a customer of TfL

The National Rail Conditions of Carriage set out your rights and responsibilities when travelling on the National Rail network.
The Heathrow Express Conditions of Carriage PDF set out your rights and responsibilities when travelling on Heathrow Express services.
